main event: A pilot reported a UFO sighting while flying over Newfoundland on April 11, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 seconds during which a bright white light illuminated the cockpit,The object was described as the size of a baseball and observed at an altitude between 15,322 and 15,920 feet,The object dissipated in a shower of red sparks with no visible trail or exhaust,The pilot's experience of 15 years led him to conclude it was not a comet or falling star,No radar confirmation was found for the object from nearby radar sites.
witness description: pilot with 15 years of experience and co-pilot
